summary: This is a cover email from Nicole Simmons submitting Ghislaine Maxwell's response to the government's motion to exclude expert testimony from Dr. Park Dietz and Dr. Elizabeth Loftus in the criminal case U.S. v. Maxwell. The filing is submitted under temporary seal to allow the government to propose redactions.

persons.name: Nicole Simmons
persons.context: Sends the email submitting Ghislaine Maxwell's legal response to the court on behalf of Jeffrey Pagliuca.

persons.name: Nathan
persons.context: The email is addressed to Judge Nathan, who is presiding over the case U.S. v. Maxwell.

persons.name: Jeffrey Pagliuca
persons.context: The request to submit the filing comes from Jeffrey Pagliuca, who is part of Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team.

persons.name: Laura Menninger
persons.context: Copied on the email, likely a member of Ghislaine Maxwell's defense legal team.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case (U.S. v. Maxwell). The attached document is her legal team's response to a government motion.

persons.name: Park Dietz
persons.context: A defense expert witness whose testimony the government sought to preclude via a motion in limine.

persons.name: Elizabeth Loftus
persons.context: A defense expert witness whose testimony the government sought to preclude via a motion in limine.

connections.description: Pagliuca is part of Maxwell's defense team, as he requested the submission of her legal response.
Menninger is copied on the legal correspondence, indicating her role on the defense team.
Simmons is sending the filing at Pagliuca's request, indicating a professional working relationship.
Dr. Dietz is a defense expert witness whose testimony Maxwell's team is seeking to admit.
Dr. Loftus is a defense expert witness whose testimony Maxwell's team is seeking to admit.

events.title: Filing of Maxwell's Response to Government Motion
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team files a response opposing the government's motion to exclude expert testimony from Dr. Park Dietz and Dr. Elizabeth Loftus.

keyFacts: The document is a cover email for a legal filing in the criminal case U.S. v. Maxwell (Case No. 20 Cr. 330).
The filing is Ghislaine Maxwell's response to a government motion to preclude the expert testimony of Dr. Park Dietz and Dr. Elizabeth Loftus.
The filing was submitted under a temporary seal to allow the government to propose necessary redactions, indicating sensitive content.
The correspondence reveals active pre-trial litigation over the admissibility of defense expert testimony.
